text: Jaffna (, , ) is the capital city of the Northern Province of Sri Lanka. The population of Jaffna is 88,138. Jaffna is Sri Lanka's 12th largest city.The biggest of all in Jaffna is the Jaffna Fort and Nallur Kandasamy temple. The statue made out of gold was the man who was the person who put Sinhala people and Tamil people together. == Related pages == * Burning of Jaffna library == References == == Other websites == * * Jaffna District – Jaffna Traveler Information * Yarl Mann – Jaffna Culture, Tradition & Heritage Category:Cities in Sri Lanka Category:1621 establishments Category:Jaffna District Category:Establishments in Sri Lanka Category:1620s establishments in Asia
title: Jaffna
